title: A Walk in the Park
description: Quinn McAllister is nanny to the spunky, love-obsessed, 11-year-old Piper Mills. Piper knows nearly every word to every boy band song created, and she is determined to use these "skills" to help her nanny find true love. Step One of her master plan: Ask a random stranger in the park if he will marry Quinn. Step Two: Sit back and watch the chaos unfold when, to everyone's surprise, the stranger in the park actually says yes.
author: Felicity Times
